definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Longan tranquilizes the disturbed mind by nourishing the blood.
The development characters of small- nutted longan embryo were studied by paraffin method.
sentences.chinese: 採用石蠟切片法研究小核龍眼胚胎髮育的特點。

sentences.english: The large seed in longan fruit is the most important factor impacting on its quality.
sentences.chinese: 在龍眼生產上，果粒大是影響品質的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: Pericarp browning is the most important factor affecting the shelf-life of longan fruit.
sentences.chinese: 果皮褐變是影響龍眼採後貯藏壽命的最主要因素。

sentences.english: Effects of simulated acid rain on polyamine contents in young fruits of …
sentences.chinese: 模擬酸雨對龍眼幼果多胺含量的影響研究。

sentences.english: Say, she is from the box in take out a bead with big longan son.
sentences.chinese: 說着，她從盒子裏掏出一個龍眼大的珠子。

sentences.english: The process of normal flower buds differentiation are significantly different from those of degradation of inflorescence in longan.
sentences.chinese: 龍眼正常的花芽分化和“衝梢”的分化過程差異很大。

sentences.english: There, more than 200 trees fell into disorder longan trees in the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 那裏，200多棵龍眼樹橫七豎八地倒在果園中。

sentences.english: Investigation of dry eye patients in out-patient;
sentences.chinese: 研究了龍眼乾果酒的加工工藝及關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Fresh and dried longan Longan meat compared with the advantages of easy to get angry.
sentences.chinese: 新鮮和幹龍眼龍眼肉比易發火的優勢。

sentences.english: Fresh and dried longan Longan meat compared with the advantages of easy to get angry.
sentences.chinese: 新鮮和幹龍眼龍眼肉比易發火的優勢。

sentences.english: Longan is a small white fruit, and it grows in Southeast Asia only.
sentences.chinese: 龍眼是一種小型白色的水果，而且它只生長在東南亞。

sentences.english: If you come to my home, I invite you to taste lychees, longan, pineapple and so on.
sentences.chinese: 如果你來到我的家鄉，我請你喫荔枝，龍眼，菠蘿等。

sentences.english: The autumn shoot of longan and its leaves were severely injured by Cornegenapsylla sinica Yang et Li.
sentences.chinese: 生產上龍眼角頰木蝨對龍眼秋梢造成嚴重危害。

sentences.english: I also remember my uncle sometimes giving me a piece of dried date or longan when I was a small kid.
sentences.chinese: 記得小時候，我叔叔經常給我一些幹棗和龍眼喫。
